home.title: Recover your well-being with Fisio Alcaraz
home.subtitle: Specialized physiotherapy center in Barcelona with more than 5 years of experience. Personalized treatments for sports injuries, rehabilitation and manual therapy.

education.title: Education & Experience
education.content: A dedicated physiotherapist with a strong academic background from Universitat Internacional de Catalunya (UIC), Juan brings a wealth of knowledge and experience to his practice. His commitment to continuous learning and professional development has led him to work with prestigious institutions, including FC Barcelona.

approach.title: Approach to Care
approach.content: Juan's approach combines evidence-based practice with personalized care, ensuring that each patient receives treatment tailored to their specific needs. His experience in sports physiotherapy and rehabilitation has made him a trusted professional in the field.

patientCare.title: Patient-Centered Care
patientCare.content: We put our patients first, ensuring their needs and goals are at the center of everything we do.

learning.title: Continuous Learning
learning.content: We stay at the forefront of physiotherapy by continuously updating our knowledge and skills.

integrity.title: Integrity & Trust
integrity.content: We build lasting relationships with our patients based on trust, honesty, and professional integrity.

cta.title: Ready to start your journey to better health?
cta.subtitle: Experience the difference our personalized care can make.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Discover our comprehensive range of specialized physiotherapy services

cta.title: Ready to start your recovery journey?
cta.description: Book your appointment today and take the first step towards better health.

physiotherapy.title: Physiotherapy
physiotherapy.description: Our comprehensive physiotherapy services are designed to help you recover from injuries, manage chronic conditions, and improve your overall physical well-being.

sports.title: Sports Therapy
sports.description: Specialized care for athletes and sports enthusiasts, focusing on injury prevention, performance enhancement, and quick recovery.

manual.title: Manual Therapy
manual.description: Hands-on therapy techniques that target specific areas of pain and dysfunction, providing immediate relief and long-term benefits.

rehabilitation.title: Rehabilitation
rehabilitation.description: Comprehensive rehabilitation programs designed to help you recover from surgery, injuries, or medical conditions.

massage.title: Therapeutic Massage
massage.description: Therapeutic massage treatments that promote healing, reduce pain, and improve overall well-being.

footer.description: Fisio Alcaraz is a specialized center for the treatment and prevention of musculoskeletal injuries. Our team combines clinical experience with personalized attention, using the latest techniques to improve your health and well-being.

expertTeam.title: Expert Team
expertTeam.description: Our team consists of highly qualified and experienced physiotherapists.

modernEquipment.title: Modern Equipment
modernEquipment.description: We use the latest technology and equipment for the best results.

personalizedCare.title: Personalized Care
personalizedCare.description: We provide customized treatment plans for each patient.

bookAppointment.title: Book your appointment
bookAppointment.description: Select a date and time that works for your physiotherapy session
